transArray.content: Very satisfied with the service, very good

Concise, clear and to the point! Dear Huazhu member guests, hello! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us your review and recognition of our service attitude. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable stay. All hotel staff look forward to your visit every time. Come and wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
